info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 17 at 11:36AM EST until February 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Wind driven snow, heavy at times, is expected this afternoon into early this evening. Lake effect snow showers are expected late this evening. North winds gusting to 40 mph expected, especially near Lake Michigan. Total snow accumulation of 3 to 7 inches expected. * WHERE...Porter County. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates greater than one inch per hour are expected this afternoon. The high snowfall rates combined with the strong winds will result in very low visibility and may cause sporadic power outages from strain on tree limbs and power lines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
